author: ryan
msg: changing query parsing error message to include the error.  SEE SOLR-204

author: mturyn
msg: Made sizers wider to make them easier to select.
Adjusted code so that the wider sizers were positioned properly.

author: mrglavas
msg: Instead of reporting the locations within the included document (or fragment) the
Locator would remain stuck at the location of the xi:include element in top-level
document. In order to report the correct location we need to update the application's
Locator as we move between the XInclude pipelines.
